name: Dashreports
slogan: A unique LawTech start-up ready to disrupt the legal market
description:
It is a LawTech product based around legal due-dilligence. We want to take a manual, repetitive and monotonous task into an automated one. We are confident that this will be revolutionary to the legal market and will has a huge potential for rapid growth. 

We have undertaken validation of the market and our research shows that there is nothing out there like our product. We already have interest from some investors, we just need someone to join this project as a co-founder and help us kick-start our vision.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description:
We need a junior coder/software engineer to help create our MVP. 

We will be offering 33% equity in the company and would like you to join as equal Co-Founder.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We need a junior coder/software engineer to help create our MVP.

We will be offering 33% equity in the company and would like you to join as equal Co-Founder.
